recordDeletes.description: As the site record gets automatically created in the background, these need to be deleted if the process fails.
recordDeletes.name: Delete_Site
recordDeletes.label: Delete Site

fields.name: Confirmation_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you wish to proceed? Please note this action cannot be undone.

fields.name: text_reqFieldsMissing
fields.fieldText:
One or more of the following required fields is missing to qualify this lead, please review and populate the missing fields and try again:


First Name

Last Name

Title

Job Title

Job Type

Booking Address

Company Registration Type

Company Registration Number (depending on Company Registration Type)

Primary Industry

fields.name: Copy_1_of_headerText1
fields.fieldText: Records with this Name or Postcode or Company Registration Number already exist in the system. Select an existing record if it matches the company, or proceed without selecting to create a new Client.

fields.name: headerText1
fields.fieldText: Records with this Name or Email already exist in the system. Select an existing record if it matches the person, or proceed without selecting to create a new record.
